questions.question: Two 5 H inductors connected in series are subjected to an electric current that changes at a rate of 4.5 amps per sec.How much voltage will be dropped across the series combination?

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is correct
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is incorrect
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is incorrect

questions.question: Two 5 H inductors connected in parallel are subjected to an electric current that changes at a rate of 4.5 amps per sec.How much voltage will be dropped across the series combination?(Hint: The total current is divided evenly between the two inductors).

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is incorrect
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is incorrect
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is correct
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is incorrect

questions.question: How large must Inductor Lx be in order to provide a total inductance of 2.5 H in this network of inductors?

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is incorrect
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is incorrect
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is correct
